value:
The Grado Empire shall never fall...
I shall seal away even the wrath of
the land with our army's might!

A new age will come to Magvel when
every Sacred Stone is destroyed. An
age in which Grado reigns supreme.

Urgh... Lyon. It falls now to you...
The future... Our people...

Traitors shall receive no mercy.
Those who turn against the Grado
Empire seal their own demise.

The Sacred Stone passed down in
our land of Grado was called the
Fire Emblem.$k$pA secret, powerful stone that once
sealed away the Demon King.
I am Vigarde, emperor of Grado.

Impudent fool. Bend your knee
before the Emperor of Grado.

All who oppose me will be
utterly destroyed.
Stop resisting...

I feel immense power... Such that this
vessel of a body can hardly contain it.

I am Vigarde, ruler of the Grado
Empire. Soon, the grasp of my rule
shall expand over all of Magvel...

In the past, some have called me the
Silent Emperor.$k$pI am now one who commands with
might, one who crushes enemies
with the utmost prejudice.$k$pWhen all the Sacred Stones in
Magvel are shattered, the age of
the weak will end.$k$pA wish 800 years in the making will
at last begin to take shape...$k$pUrgh... Ah... Lyon...I...$k$pFor what reason do I hesitate? We
cannot move the hands of time. The
course of fate cannot be reversed...
You would defy me?
Perish.
You vex me.
Death to all traitors.
Lyon...
I am Vigarde, emperor of Gradoâ€”nay, all of Magvel.
You dare lay a hand on me? You must not know fear.
Frelia's Sacred Stone has been destroyed. Now, you must locate the Stone of Renais.
Find the children of Renais. Find them and take from them the bracelets that they wear...
Crush the Sacred Stones housed in Jehanna and Rausten...
Lyon... Our people must be saved.
All decisions are mine to make. You need not concern yourself with a single detail but obeying.
Very well.
Hm.
Shatter them.
